title: 06/28/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 06/28/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin takes a look at the Hawks, their run to the Eastern Conference Finals and why this team is not what we’ve built them up to be. He explains why Damian Lillard could find his new wingman this summer at the Olympics playing for team USA. He also tells you why he was right about the Clippers and wrong about Tom Brady. Plus, NBA veteran Raja Bell joins the show to talk about Chris Paul’s leadership on the Suns and how Trae Young fits into today’s NBA.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
